ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But the truth is that if he is one of Those Brought Near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then, if he is one of the honoured,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So if he is one of those who are near-stationed (to Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (If a dying soul) is of those near to God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then if the dying one is of those having proximity, –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, if he be of the Muqarrabin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then if he is one of those drawn nigh (to Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, if he be of those brought nigh the Throne,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus if he is of those brought nigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But if he [the dying person] is one of those brought near to God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then if he be of the broughtnigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then, if he be of those brought near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus, then, if he be of those Nearest to Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, if he (the dying person) be of the Muqarrabun (those brought near to Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If he is among the near
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But if he is one of those brought near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:88] Thus if he, the dead person, be of those brought near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus if he is of those brought nigh) to the Garden of Eden,
